title: ROCKY Arctic BearClaw GORE-TEX Waterproof Insulated Camo Boot
features: Air-Port Cushion Footbed Circulates Air With Every Step
Bearclaw 3D Outsole With Exclusive Rocky 3D Welt Construction
description: The temperature dropping won't prevent you from getting outdoors in these rugged Â Rocky Boots 10" BearClaw. Regardless if you wear them for hunting, as snow boots, or even work in them, you'll appreciate how much warmth, comfort, and dryness protection these durable boots provide. To create the look of this BearClaw upper, Rocky utilized soft, brown full-grain leather, durable nylon and a Mossy Oak Break-Up camouflage print. The combination of materials allows this men's boot to be durable and hardy during even the more treacherous weather conditions. To keep your feet warm, even in the most frigid temperatures, this BearClaw boot has 1,400 grams of 3M Thinsulate Ultra Insulation. When the temperature is below freezing, getting wet feet isn't an option. The GORE-TEX membrane will not let any external moisture enter your boots; this allows the inside of your footwear to be durably waterproof and highly breathable. To be comfortable on your feet, these boots have the Air-Port cushion footbed Not only do you get cushioning and support from this footbed, but it also causes air to continuously circulate within your boots. This feature helps eliminate achy feet and odor. The BearClaw 3D outsole and the exclusive Rocky 3D welt construction allow this boot to have grip, strength and durability. You'll wish the rest of your wardrobe was this warm, comfortable and dry. Get your pair today!
